original_title: The Golden Age of Porn: Carol Connors
overview: Carol Connors had a huge career in porn ranging from 1970 to 1986. She's probably best known for her role as the nurse in the classic film Deep Throat. She was also a frequent guest hostess on The Gong Show. Her classic American beauty and genuinely wonderful and completely real chest kept her in the forefront of adult films for many years.
title: The Golden Age of Porn: Carol Connors
